title: website
text:
library(tidyverse)

── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors

data <- read_csv("artik.csv")

New names:
Rows: 12089 Columns: 15
── Column specification
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr
(2): direction, device dbl (12): ...1, entry_id, uv, lux, temperature,
pressure, humidity, pm1, pm... dttm (1): time
ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. ℹ
Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
• `` -> `...1`

library(openair)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(latticeExtra)

Loading required package: lattice

Attaching package: 'latticeExtra'

The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2':

    layer



data |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = pm2_5, y = pm1)) + geom_point(aes(col="state", size="popdensity")) + geom_smooth(method="loess", se=F) 

Warning: Using size for a discrete variable is not advised.


`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'


Warning: Removed 353 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range
(`stat_smooth()`).


Warning: Removed 353 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).








g <- ggplot(data, aes(x = temperature))
g + geom_density(aes(fill=factor("cyl")))

data |>
  ggplot(data, mapping = aes(x = time, y=pm1)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity", fill="tomato3")

Warning: Removed 353 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_bar()`).










data |>
  ggplot(data, mapping = aes(x = pm1, y = time)) + 
  geom_point(stat="identity", size=6) 

Warning: Removed 353 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
